name: Fast Motorcycle Driver 2016
description:
Fast Motorcycle Driver 2016 is a upgraded and improved version of Fast Motorcycle Driver.
We make HUGE effort for you to enjoy Real Motorbike Driving Simulation.

If you like Simulator Games and Motorbike Driving, try it for FREE.

You can earn virtual money to buy better and better bikes.
There are cross, race, city, chopper, enduro, scooter bikes in the game.

Environment design:
Reach the top of the Skyscraper in a big city.
Reach lot of kilometers in the desert country.
Keep the rules in the city traffic.

Feel like a real Motorbike Driver.

***FEATURES***

* Motorbike Driving Experience
* Easy controllers
* Help screen to make money
* Fantastic suspension
* 10+ HD Motorbikes
* Huge Real CITY Maps
* Real World Environments
* Realistic Camera Views
* Beautiful Full HD Graphics
* Realistic engine sounds
* Realistic physics behavior
* Realistic acceleration control
